name: 韓秉軒
objective:
本課程主要的目標為從應用與設計的角度，切入虛擬實境產業的各種可能性。從新穎科技與體感科技研發、教育與訓練應用、沉浸式敘事、沉浸式遊戲、以及設計工具與內容製作等，各方面進行探討。期望藉由合作學習和雛型製作來強化學生跨領域提案之創新能力。
The main objective of the program is to take from the application and design perspective, cutting into the possibilities of the virtual reality industry. Exploring from the educational applications, design tools, and virtual reality games, to virtual reality interactive animation, etc.
schedule:
